subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, the second seed and defending Madrid Open champion, made an early exit on Thursday, beaten by Kei Nishikori of Japan, 6-4,1-6, 6-2.
snippet: Roger Federer, the second seed and defending Madrid Open champion, made an early exit on Thursday, beaten by Kei Nishikori of Japan, 6-4,1-6, 6-2.
